title: Adapting Large Language Models for Time Series Modeling via a Novel Parameter-efficient Adaptation Method
details: J Zhang, W Zhu, J Gao - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.13725, 2025
abstract: Time series modeling holds significant importance in many real-world applications and has been extensively studied. While pre-trained foundation models have made impressive strides in the fields of natural language processing (NLP) and computer …
